task_summary: Detect, approach, grasp, and lift the small red object from the tabletop.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-style manipulator with a parallel gripper must pick a red object from a cluttered tabletop containing cans, bottles, a white carton, and other items. The contact sheet shows the arm moving from a central home pose toward the right side where a small red block sits next to a taller red bottle. The behavior emphasizes reliable perception, precise alignment, and a top/pinch grasp followed by a short lift to confirm acquisition.
preconditions: Robot and camera are calibrated to the table frame
Workspace is free of obstacles beyond the shown items
Red object is visible on the table
stepwise_plan: Move to a safe pre-grasp height above it
Execute the grasp at the computed pose
Lift the object slightly to secure
success_criteria: Object securely held (no slip) after closing
failure_and_recovery: If detection fails, re-detect or scan
If alignment times out, retreat and re-approach
If grasp unstable, reopen and retry with adjusted pose
task_long_description.termination: Terminate once the object is detected in the gripper and lifted to the target distance.

frame_7.now_evidence: Gripper encloses the small red block; clear grasp event.
frame_7.predicts_next: Immediate lift expected, indicating successful pick.

frame_8.now_evidence: Object appears lifted from the surface.

node_specs.description: Detect the red object on the table.
Move to a safe pre-grasp height above the target.
Approach the object and align within tight tolerance.
Open the gripper to accept the object.
Plan a pinch grasp and store it on the blackboard.
Close with moderate force to secure the object.
Lift the grasped object off the table.

failure_modes: Object not detected due to occlusion/lighting
recovery_strategy: Retry detection or perform a scan
Retreat and re-approach from higher offset
Increase timeout or relax tolerance slightly
assumptions: Frames show the robot grasping the small red block near the right side, not the taller red bottle; the symbol 'red_object' refers to the small red block if multiple red items are present.
